name: The cleaner (with its tongue)
description:
Your mission is to clean every toxic shrub with the tip of your tongue. Be careful and don't get close to them because their toxicity will hurt you!

Remember that your tongue has a limited reach and the toxicity on the shrubs will attract you!

The game and assets were made in 3 hours using Godot 3.2.1

HOW TO PLAY

Move with WASD and clean the toxic stuff by swiping your tongue over it with the mouse. Only the tip of the tongue will clean it!
